archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1199
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to search the site/app easily

properties.value: Search itself would be wider then searching the DS only or SC only but the whole portal, so probably a part of some common components. More information needed on LLD if some specific tags, sitemap or anything like this should be provided on DS pages.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
